episodes.title: Shiny Happy People Cult to Stand Up Comedy with Davey Jackson (Part 2)
episodes.description: In part two of this wild 2-part convo, Liat chats with comedian and cult survivor Davey Jackson. In this second half, things get even deeper—and somehow even funnier. Davey opens up about the psychological fallout of leaving a cult, the behavioral patterns that kept him stuck, and how comedy became his unexpected lifeline. Liat and Davey break down cult dynamics through a behavioral lens, sprinkle in some serious shade, and prove that healing doesn’t have to be humorless. Don’t miss this final dose of insight, laughter, and truth bombs. Behavior Concepts Covered: Pairing Behavior Contract Stimulus Discrimination Modeling Operational Definition Dead Man’s Test Positive & Negative Reinforcement Matching Law Connect with Davey: Instagram - @daveyjax Youtube - @daveyjaxx TikTok - @daveyjaxx Facebook - Davey Jackson Friends with Davey Podcast Check Out Our Sponsors! episodes.title: Shiny Happy People Cult to Stand Up Comedy with Davey Jackson (Part 1) | Behavior Bitches Podcast
episodes.description:
We’re sitting down with comedian, cult survivor, and all-around chaos agent Davey Jackson, and the vibe is unhinged in the best way. From chapped lips and basic Jewish girls in Uggs to the rules of gay switches and why feminine energy is a pairing strategy—nothing is off limits.

Davey and Liat go full banter-mode in this episode, and it’s as hilarious as it is revealing. Part One is where the party starts.

Behavior Concepts Covered:
Pairing 
Setting Contingency 
Behavior Contract
Stimulus Discrimination
Modeling 
Exclusionary Time Out
Operational Defiant 
Dead Men’s Test 
Positive & Negative Reinforcement
Matching Law 

Want both parts NOW, totally unfiltered?
Hit up our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/escaping-cult-1-128001802?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=postshare_creator&utm_content=join_link
